channel.title: VPN connections with whonix
channel.description: Hi, I have read all about using VPNs in whonix, but I have been unable to successfully connect to one. I have the option of using PPTP,L2TP or IPSEC (not OpenVPN), and I know that all of these may not be possible. Every time I try to connect to such services the connection breaks, connecting without using whonix works fine. Anyone care to tell me their experiences about VPNs in whonix?

item.title: VPN connections with whonix
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Do those support UDP?

Lotâ€™s of people are capable of using VPNs and Whonix using OpenVPN. Just search the forums.

item.title: VPN connections with whonix
item.dc:creator: resetter
item.description:
Hi, I have read all about using VPNs in whonix, but I have been unable to successfully connect to one.
I have the option of using PPTP,L2TP or IPSEC (not OpenVPN), and I know that all of these may not be possible.
Every time I try to connect to such services the connection breaks, connecting without using whonix works fine.
Anyone care to tell me their experiences about VPNs in whonix?
